items.text: that's at his top pace, and back of a length. Rohit has an easier time guiding it past gully's right and away to third man
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, 1 run

items.preText: A short point in place for Dhawan. There's a short midwicket as well
items.text: lets the short ball come to him and calmly turns it around to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, no run

items.text: superb hit! He takes on the bouncer, swivelling on his back foot and dismissing it over the square leg boundary. Doesn't rise high enough to cause any concern to Dhawan and he makes the bowler pay
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, SIX runs

items.text: nudges the back of a length ball from off stump to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, no run

items.text: there's perhaps the first mis-hit of the innings - Dhawan going for an ambitious pull shot when the length isn't quite so short. Gets beaten on the bottom edge
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, no run

items.preText: sravanth: "Both these matches combined, there are around 2 Billion cricket fans from 4 countries playing, compared to a total of 2.5 Billion cricket fans. That's something we do not witness every day. "
items.text: tosses it up and gets such lovely drift away from the bat. Rohit covers it with his big stride forward
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: solid block from the India captain, even though Mehidy tries to beat him with a quicker delivery on off stump
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: pushes back seeing the length not quite full and tickles it to short fine leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: goes straight on as Rohit presses forward to defend outside off. Good variations from Mehidy
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: now he goes wide of the crease for a tossed up offbreak, Rohit drives smoothly through extra cover
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: slipping down leg and Dhawan pops it to deep midwicket
items.postText: Siddharth Reddy: "Everything Bangladesh team was in 2016-17, it isn't this year. That shot from Shakib today sums up their 2018. Zero temperament"
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 2 runs

items.preText: Navaza Khan: "sitting in office without going for lunch with 2 tabs open with cricinfo... Bangladesh still have a chance to take Ro-Hitman, he is yet to reach that ultimate first 20-balls facing benchmark before starting the music to the opposition.. waiting to see my comments on cricinfo page... the other match is also going very interestingly PAK loosing early wicket.."
items.text: he's careful against the cutter, keeping his bat close to the body and blocking the shortish delivery to point
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: punches a fuller delivery on the up to cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: leans forward to present the full face of the bat to a pitched up delivery outside off
items.postText: Nabil Ahmed Kha: "@Siddharth Reddy buddy they just beat the West indies both in ODI series and T20 series about few months ago"
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: cutter on leg stump, tempting the batsman to close the face, but the ball is too new to grip into this dry pitch and cause problems. Rohit is more than able to work it off his pads to square leg
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: full on off stump, he drives to short cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, no run

items.text: drums it down the ground! That bottom hand power shines through as Rohit all but extends his front-foot defence and yet the ball scurries away over Mustafizur's head
items.postText: Soham Basak: "Just this once, I want India to be 3 down for 50. Then, hopefully, DK and MSD can consolidate and take us home. Important for the middle order to get runs before the final."
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Sharma, FOUR runs

items.text: turn for Mehidy as he pushes through a fuller delivery on middle stump and gets it to straighten off the angle from round the wicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: full on middle, he defends carefully
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, no run

items.text: the ball drifts into his pads and Dhawan is able to put it away to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: lets the length ball turn from outside off and plays with it to square leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, no run

items.text: a little bit of an inside edge as Mehidy gets the ball to sneak in through the air with Rohit defending outside the line
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Sharma, 1 run

items.text: pushes, gently, to mid-on to pinch a single
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Dhawan, 1 run

items.text: hits him on the pads and goes up in appeal, but this ball - while full - would have gone down leg. Dhawan would actually be miffed he couldn't get runs off it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, no run

items.text: easy little flick to long leg. Mustafizur sets the left-hander up with a ball on the pads - while fine leg is up - and Dhawan says thank you
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dhawan, FOUR runs
